column4: Does anyone know how (if possible) to specify the NETBIOS name of the machine the request is being made to (not the client machine) so I can mount (or smbmount) a share?  I'm working with a machine that has multiple names and it distinguishes by the requested name (as it only has a single IP).
yeah, but what options?  I can specify the client machines netbios name, but not the netbios name of the machine that I'm making the request to?
I did tried putting the netbios name with the ip in /etc/hosts, but it doesn't treat it as the netbios name, so it doesn't help
